messages.message:
Hey team,
I am working on getting automatic package upgrade PRs for model-service. I am seeing recently we have moved to poetry, but I also got to know that we maintain multiple venvs for different models. Can someone help me with the whole process of dependency management in model-service ? If possible we can schedule a short call to discuss this.
cc @sudeep @jayapandian.ponraj

Sure.
So model-service has “base” or “global” dependencies. These are packages installed in the main/default venv for the service.
Then it has 2 additional venvs that it installs called ibformer-default and venv-2.3.0. These are built on top of the base venv but install additional packages relevant to those venvs.
Hope this helps.
